ai-patthana14.19:0.2_0: (The teachings should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana14.19:1.1_0: Completely understanding the teaching, not for the sake of perception ...
ai-patthana14.19:1.1_1: fugal causes. Sensual phenomena don’t give rise to diversity of elements. ...
ai-patthana14.19:1.1_3: The causes and conditions for the arising of thought ...
ai-patthana14.19:1.1_4: The hindrances are a cause: this is a condition for the origin of the world.
